title: PML-N workers’ conventions in Kasur, Sheikhupura, Swat today: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 16 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Friday that Pakistan Muslim League (N) workers’ conventions will be held today in Kasur, Sheikhupura and Swat.
In a tweet, she said that Minister for Planning and Development Ahsan Iqbal, Minister for Railways Khawaja Saad Rafiq and Malik Ahmad Khan would address at Children’s Park, Khadian Khas at Kasur at 3 pm.
She said Federal Minister Mian Javed Latif would address the workers at Chitti Kothi, Sheikhupura at 4 pm.Marriyum Aurangzeb said Prime Minister’s Adviser Amir Muqam will address the workers’ convention in Swat at 320 pm.
